title: Naturopathic Consultation
about: Initial consultations are 75 minutes long and consist of a detailed intake, complaint oriented physical exam and any necessary lab requisitions.
about_more: From your initial appointment you can expect a treatment plan to get started, along with any forms or lab work that needs to be completed. After your initial appointment, Ayla does an in-depth assessment of your case, along with any new lab work and compares it to the latest research. A full detailed and specific treatment plan is offered on the second appointment.

title: IV Therapy & Vitamin Injection Consultation
about: Initial consultations are 15 minutes long and consist of a brief intake, review of systems, discussion of goals and addressing any risk factors.
about_more: From your initial appointment you can expect a requisition for lab work and tailored IV plan. After your initial appointment, Dr. Ayla will review the lab results and approve you for the IV therapy. Once youâ€™ve been approved we can book your IV drop as listed below.
